resources.string: What would you like help with?
Section %1d is just a dummy section.
Please confirm your offer to help.
Take a look at some open requests to help your Neighbrs!
Reach out to your Neighbrs to borrow tools, organize an event or even ask for a ride to the store!
Token retrieved and sent to server! You can now use gcmsender to send downstream messages to this app.
An error occurred while either fetching the InstanceID token, sending the fetched token to the server or subscribing to the PubSub topic. Please try running the sample again.
Giving and getting help has never been easier!
Already have an account? Sign in
Use thyNeighbr to borrow tools, organize an event, or even ask for a ride to the store.
Busy? Don\'t worry, you can help out on your own time. Choose the requests that fit with your life.
We verify all addresses and make you visible only to your real neighbrs.
Best of all, you\'ll get to know your community and build trusted relationships.
